statements: SELECT * FROM image_recognition_data
SELECT id, recognition_result, image_path FROM image_recognition_data
SELECT recognition_result FROM image_recognition_data WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM image_recognition_data ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, image_path FROM image_recognition_data WHERE recognition_result IS NOT NULL LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM image_recognition_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT image_path, recognition_result FROM image_recognition_data WHERE recognition_result IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, image_path FROM image_recognition_data WHERE image_path LIKE '%cat%';
SELECT * FROM image_recognition_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_images, recognition_result FROM image_recognition_data GROUP BY recognition_result HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM image_data;
SELECT image_file, image_label FROM image_data WHERE image_recognition_score > 0.8;
SELECT id, image_file, tag_name FROM image_data JOIN image_tags ON image_data.id = image_tags.image_id;
SELECT image_label FROM image_data WHERE image_label LIKE 'Cat%';
SELECT id, image_recognition_score FROM image_data WHERE image_recognition_score < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM image_data WHERE image_recognition_score > 0.5;
SELECT image_label, image_recognition_score FROM image_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_file, tag_name FROM image_data INNER JOIN image_tags ON image_data.id = image_tags.image_id;
SELECT image_label FROM image_data WHERE image_file LIKE '%.png';
SELECT image_label, AVG(image_recognition_score) AS avg_score FROM image_data GROUP BY image_label HAVING avg_score > 0.6;
SELECT * FROM image_data;
SELECT image_url, recognition_result FROM image_data;
SELECT id, image_url, recognition_result FROM image_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM image_tags ORDER BY tag_name DESC;
SELECT image_id, description FROM image_metadata WHERE metadata_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM image_data WHERE id = 1
SELECT id, recognition_result FROM image_data ORDER BY recognition_result ASC
SELECT image_url FROM image_data WHERE recognition_result LIKE '%dog%'
SELECT image_tags.tag_name, image_metadata.description FROM image_tags INNER JOIN image_metadata ON image_tags.tag_id = image_metadata.metadata_id
SELECT image_data.id, image_data.image_url, image_tags.tag_name FROM image_data INNER JOIN image_tags ON image_data.id = image_tags.tag_id
SELECT * FROM image_data;
SELECT image_name, image_url FROM image_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_name, image_url FROM image_data ORDER BY image_name DESC;
SELECT label_name, image_id FROM image_labels WHERE label_name = 'Nature';
SELECT location, capture_date FROM image_metadata WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT id, image_name FROM image_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT image_name, image_url FROM image_data WHERE image_name LIKE 'cat%';
SELECT * FROM image_metadata WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT image_id, label_name FROM image_labels ORDER BY label_name DESC;
SELECT id, image_id, JSON_LENGTH(feature_vector) AS num_features FROM image_features WHERE JSON_LENGTH(feature_vector) > 5;
SELECT * FROM ImageData;
SELECT image_name, image_data FROM ImageData WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT label_name FROM ImageLabels WHERE label_id = 5;
SELECT feature_description, feature_data FROM ImageFeatures WHERE feature_id = 3;
SELECT image_id, label_id, feature_id, confidence FROM ImageResults WHERE result_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM ImageData;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM ImageData WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_name, image_data FROM ImageData ORDER BY image_name DESC;

SELECT ir.result_id, il.label_name, if.feature_description FROM ImageResults ir JOIN ImageLabels il ON ir.label_id = il.label_id JOIN ImageFeatures if ON ir.feature_id = if.feature_id WHERE ir.confidence > 0.8;
SELECT im.metadata_key, im.metadata_value FROM ImageMetadata im WHERE im.image_id IN (SELECT image_id FROM ImageData WHERE image_name LIKE 'A%');
